slide.title: Request Parser

list.bullet: Converts raw request data from a source to an abstracted %ezcMvcRequest% object.

slide.example: class ezcMvcRequest { public $date; // DateTime public $protocol; // string public $host; // string public $uri; // string public $requestId; // string public $referrer; // string public $variables; // array public $body; // string public $files; // array(ezcMvcRequestFile) public $accept; // ezcMvcRequestAccept public $agent; // ezcMvcRequestUserAgent public $authentication; // ezcMvcRequestAuthentication public $raw; // ezcMvcRawRequest public $cookies; // array(ezcMvcRequestCookie) }
